results.overview: Three New York businessmen decide to take a "Wild West" vacation that turns out not to be the relaxing vacation they had envisioned.
results.title: City Slickers

results.original_title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
results.overview: Mitch Robbins 40th birthday begins quite well until he returns home and finds his brother Glen, the black sheep of the family, in his sofa. Nevertheless he is about to have a wonderful birthday-night with his wife when he discovers a treasure map of Curly by chance. Together with Phil and unfortunately Glen he tries to find the hidden gold of Curly's father in the desert of Arizona.
results.title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold

results.original_title: City Slickers Can't Stay with Me: The Coach Bob Larsen Story
results.overview: The story of legendary Hall of Fame Coach Bob Larsen, his career, success and influence at every coaching level.
results.title: City Slickers Can't Stay with Me: The Coach Bob Larsen Story

results.overview: From Nashville With Music is another slim plot that gives an excuse for Nashville country stars to perform. The stars are Leo G. Carroll, Marilyn Maxwell, Jose Gonzalez-Gonzalez, Marty Robbins (singing "El Paso"), Buddy Allen, Bill Anderson, Don Gibson, Merle Haggard, George Jones, Cousin Jody, Buck Owens, Bonnie Owens, Charley Pride, Susan Raye, Carl Smith, Wynn Stewart and Tammy Wynette. (from http://archive.tennessean.com/article/20070511/SPECIAL0907/705110501/1969-Movie-From-Nashville-Music)
results.title: From Nashville With Music
